Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Blue Rupee#.
